pageContent: Objectives: To assess the long-term sexual potency and attrition in sexual function after iodine-125 ((125)I) seed radiotherapy and the effect of sildenafil on radiation-induced erectile dysfunction (ED).

metaData.source:
Predictors of preferences and utilities in men treated with 3D-CRT for prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/14697418/
